traits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: When Ruxithid fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Mental Fortitude
entries: Ruxithid has advantage on saving throws against the {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened} conditions.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Ruxithid makes two Psi-Charged Scimitar attacks.

actions.name: Psi-Charged Scimitar
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6 damage) psychic damage.
